name: Pokémon Yellow static Version
description:
15 years after the pokemon yellow version events, you go on an adventure and looking for pokémon to become an exceptional trainer, you explore Kanto and go to the 151 pokémon in a completely crazy pokémon game and WTF, v will you arrive to catch them all and become a Pokemon Master Good luck
